quote: Great ones are willing to get burned time and again as they sharpen their swords in the fire. – Josh Waitzkin
fact: In 1778, fashionable women of Paris never went out in blustery weather without a lightning rod attached to their hats.
joke: What happens when you anger a brain surgeon? They will give you a piece of your mind.
